item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I’m Xu Wu.

University of Wollongong

Master’s Degree in Telecommunication Engineering

06/2025

My Abilties

Skills

Skilled in MATLAB and C programming.

Familiar with computer network protocols such as TCP/IP, BGP, etc.

Knowledgeable in image and signal processing techniques, including compression, filtering, and enhancement.

College English Test (CET-6) score: 525, demonstrating strong listening, speaking, reading, and writing abilities.

Skilled in office software, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.

Statement

I am confident that my experience, skills, and dedication make me a strong candidate, and I am eager to bring my expertise to my future work and explore potential collaboration opportunities.

  • Top 20% in Class

  • Strong Practical Skills

  • Volunteering Advocate

Case Studies

Image Compression Algorithm

Engaged in the development of an image compression algorithm, effectively reducing storage space requirements while maintaining image quality

View Project

Optimize Network Routing

Participated in a project optimizing network routing based on the BGP protocol, enhancing network stability and data transmission efficiency

View Project

Noise Suppression System

Involved in implementing a noise suppression system based on spectral subtraction, improving the clarity of voice communications

View Project

Leadership

College Debate Competition Host

Orchestrated the annual College Debate Competition, facilitating discussions on diverse topics and managing event logistics.

Anhui Agricultural University, 2020

Class Monitor

Acted as the primary liaison between faculty and students, organized class activities, and upheld academic integrity.

Anhui Agricultural University, 2018-2019

Volunteer Group Leader

Led a team of volunteers during the university’s sports meet, coordinating activities and ensuring smooth operation of events.

Anhui Agricultural University Sports Meeting, 2022

Achievements

Second Prize, 8th “Datang Cup” National College Students’ Mobile Communication Competition, May 2021

Excellent Volunteer, 53rd Track and Field Games, Anhui Agricultural University, December 2018

Excellence Award, 14th Career Planning Competition, School of Information and Computer Science, April 2019

Third Prize, Anti-Epidemic Mental Health Knowledge Competition, Ministry of Science and Industry, Anhui Agricultural University, May 2020

Second Place, College Basketball Match, May 2020

Top Four, College Volleyball Match, May 2021
